title: Pre SGC raw HOFer sale (and 1 common PB)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Pre SGC raw HOFer sale (and 1 common PB)
posts.post_content:
Just throwing these up for sale before I send them to SGC and ebay.  These prices are firm.  I'm fine with sending them off if nobody wants them at these prices.

Shipping $2

Bender no trees SC 350 $58  SOLD
Bresnahan P150 (this card is incredibly nice, pic included) $100  SOLD
Bresnahan batting PB $50  SOLD
Evers Yellow Sky P350-460 $80
Griffith portrait P350 $45
Hummell PB (crease-free) $25  SOLD
Joss pitching SC 350 $60
Waddell throwing P150 $58
Wheat P350-460 $35
Brown portrait P150 $62
Wallace P350 $45
Damn, you had to post this now when I have no money!!

[quote name="LukeLyon" post=1411796]

Shipping $2

Hummell PB (crease-free) $25[/QUOTE]

I will take the Hummell Polar Bear.  Please let me know where to send payment. 

Best regards,

Eric

I'll take the Bender and the Bresnahan batting.  Please let me know where to send payment as well.

Thanks, 

Brian
